meanings.definition: Shaped like a globe or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The globated balloon floated gently in the air.
meanings.sent2: The earth is a globated planet in the vast universe.
meanings.sent3: The globated snowman looked comical with its round body and small head.
meanings.sent4: Her globated laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The globated orange glowed warmly in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The globated cheeks of the baby were so chubby and cute.
meanings.sent2: The globated clouds slowly drifted across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The globated pumpkin sat proudly on the front porch.
meanings.sent4: His globated ego needed to be deflated a bit.
meanings.sent5: The globated hill rolled gently down to the valley below.
